dublinCore.title: 113 HR 1300 RH: To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer programs and community partnerships for the benefit of national wildlife refuges, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Runyan (for himself and Mr. Sablan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on March 20, 2013

form.official-title: To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer programs and community partnerships for the benefit of national wildlife refuges, and for other purposes.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Wildlife Refuge System volunteer, community partnership, and education programs
section.text:
Section 7(g) of the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 ( 16 U.S.C. 742f(g) ) is amended by striking 2011 through 2014 and inserting
2015 through 2017
.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
